WorkItem.Description:
Hey,
 
Nusphere PhpEd reports transliteration failed for these files:
Transliteration	Transliteration failed in file ***\PHPExcel\Shared\JAMA\examples\LagrangeInterpolation2.php (1:1). Invalid character: 0xB2	11:25:51	LagrangeInterpolation2.php
Transliteration	Transliteration failed in file ***\PHPExcel\Shared\JAMA\examples\LagrangeInterpolation.php (1:1). Invalid character: 0xB2	11:25:51	LagrangeInterpolation.php
Transliteration	Transliteration failed in file ***\PHPExcel\Shared\PDF\tcpdf.php (1:1). Invalid character: 0xFC	11:25:51	tcpdf.php
Transliteration	Transliteration failed in file ***\PHPExcel\Shared\PDF\tcpdf.php (12:14). Invalid character: 0xEB	11:25:51	tcpdf.php
Transliteration	Transliteration failed in file ***\PHPExcel\Shared\PDF\tcpdf.php (12:20). Invalid character: 0xED	11:25:51	tcpdf.php
Transliteration	Transliteration failed in file ***\PHPExcel\Shared\PDF\tcpdf.php (8789:23). Invalid character: 0xFC	11:25:51	tcpdf.php
 
Looks like they're not UTF-8 encoded?!

Comments.Message:
Fixing this in SVN.
You were right! They were not UTF-8 encoded.
